title: Plane and Nut Problem
stem: A plane has taken off the runway and has gained a speed of 300 mph making an angle 15 degrees with the horizontal. When the plane is 1600 ft off the ground, a loose nut detaches from the plane and falls to the ground. Neglect air resistance and assume that the plane travels in a straight line at constant speed. Approximately, how high will the nut rise from its point of detachment before it begins to fall to the ground?
prereqs: basic understanding of kinematics and projectile motion
